title: Mobile Device Management (MDM)
description: Codeproof technologies is a leading platform provider of true SaaS, cloud based enterprise mobile security platform. Our patent pending technology secures your personal and corporate data in mobile phone and tablets. With Codeproof's ease of deployment and management support for multiple device platforms, businesses can quickly ramp up their security solutions, managing both employee-owned (BYOD-Bring Your Own Device) and corporate-owned devices from a single cloud console.
